'''Wondrous Lovely Flower''' is an [[Event Item]] obtained from [[Albedo]] during the {{Quest|Realm of Fog and Wind}}.

This flower resembles a [[Sweet Flower]], which is a variant of a flower that existed in the past called a "Tetratanic Sweet Flower."
